column1: This is terrible. A warehouse of aid for Puerto Rico just sitting around unused despite all of the devastating recent hurricanes & earthquakes. There should be an investigation & full accountability. Any other warehouses like this? Who is responsible? How did it happen? 🇵🇷🇺🇸 https://t.co/lW7BdfKfd4

NY's cashless bail law is brand new & already a giant failure in need of repeal. Violent criminals are being released w/o bail sometimes winding back up in police custody within days/hours. Instead of handcuffing criminals this new law handcuffs justice. https://t.co/6Xgp1yFxbH

This should have never been allowed to happen. An illegal immigrant sexually assaulted and murdered a 92-year-old woman. This animal would have been deported if it wasn't for NYC's disastrous sanctuary city policies which are making New Yorkers less safe. https://t.co/p8mSpJPHBy
Great News! The Senate just passed the USMCA trade deal estimated to add 176000 new US jobs and $68 billion in new US economic growth. A great win for the American economy and American worker! 🇺🇸

Schiff the least credible voice in DC is being named as an impeachment manager after ripping apart our country & flat out lying during the impeachment sham. It's past time for us to start healing from the destruction this impeachment circus has caused. This pick doesn't help.

If you are in Congress & seeing homeless vets on the street doesn’t motivate you to do something about it you need a new job. Honored to participate w @RodneyDavis in the "tackling homelessness" Q&A hosted by @thehill to discuss real solutions to an issue close to my heart. https://t.co/RdPAsqR4MC

New York's new bail reform law is a disaster. After law enforcement's successful crackdown on gang violence many of those arrested are now being released right back out onto our streets. This needs to be repealed ASAP! https://t.co/lvMBMAyX9M
Happy Anniversary to my amazing wife friend and love of my life. https://t.co/LPM5XLgtto

First NYS Dems began issuing driver’s licenses to illegal immigrants. Now they are pushing for an automatic voter registration. There seems to be no end to the bad ideas coming out of Albany. One party Democratic rule is wreaking havoc on our state. Not good!
Unbelievable. Really bad take Erin. There is NOTHING acceptable or friendly about Iranians declaring "Death to America." https://t.co/ZuQDCa0lKL

Yesterday the House rushed to pass a ridiculous non binding messaging reso a glorified press release just to punch POTUS in the face for taking out the world’s biggest terrorist. Soleimani was responsible for the deaths of 600+ US troops. Such a weak effort to kick off 2020. https://t.co/PJt3j43fG4

Strong message from President Trump this morning. Iran is faced with two options and the choice should be simple. Pursuing peace prosperity and freedom should be strongly favored over poverty instability and conflict.
There better not be any American casualties. Iran just made an extremely bad call to escalate.

After House Democrats publicly declared that their case was entirely proven parroting “the facts are uncontested” Senate Democrats say they are in need of new evidence to prove their case. Which is it?  ...That’s a rhetorical question. We know the answer.

The longer Pelosi sits on her two ridiculous articles of impeachment the longer this charade continues before our nation can heal and move on from the damage she caused ripping our country in half with this whole circus.

After Qassim Soleimani got over 600 US troops killed & thousands more wounded he can just rot in hell with Bin Laden & al-Baghdadi. All I'm upset about is we weren’t able to blow him up twice. Good riddance. The world is a better place without him.

Many condemning POTUS for taking out Soleimani would go ballistic if POTUS didn't do what he did & Soleimani’s planned attacks on US troops & diplomats had been allowed to play out. Plus...Soleimani is responsible for killing 600+ US troops & wounding 1000s more. Good riddance!

On top of actively planning new attacks Qassim Soleimani was responsible for the deaths of hundreds of US servicemen and the injuries of thousands more. Iran shouldn’t be shocked that America took out Soleimani. They should just be shocked it didn’t happen sooner.

Iran Quds Force’s Qassim Soleimani has been killed. Necessary justice served & an urgent effective move to protect other Americans being targeted by this evil murderer. Such a blessing to live in the greatest nation in the world w/ the greatest military to ever defend a country!

NY’s cashless bail system is brand new & already a crisis. Hate crime assault & child endangerment are part of a massive list of crimes that people will be released for without bail. This is boneheaded & NYS officials must reverse course immediately. https://t.co/jlSRIoaULt

Happy New Year! It was a great night with the family welcoming in 2020 with the President and his family.   Wishing all of you a fantastic blessed new year with much health and happiness throughout the year ahead. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/vTLtXd2qdK

Iranian backed terrorists just attacked our US Embassy in Baghdad shouting "Death to America". Priority 1 is the safety of US personnel. Our strength this time around shouldn't be delivered w/pallets of cash ignorance & weakness. It must be appropriate fierce & powerful.

If the facts are truly "uncontested" as Speaker Pelosi loves to claim... why are Senate Democrats demanding new witnesses to prove what House Democrats insist are already absolutely proven? Such a total farce.

NY officials silent in the face of rising anti-Semitic attacks are part of the problem. Those who prop up BDS support cashless bail embrace activist anti-Semites like Linda Sarsour and don’t support our great law enforcement enough are all part of the problem here as well.

Honored to be in the company of the best of the best this holiday week. #MerryChristmas & #HappyHanukkah from Qatar Bahrain & Kuwait! The past 2+ days have been a whirlwind journey to bases throughout the Mid East. The highlight has been serving meals to deployed troops from NY1 https://t.co/Si17JTLcqk

While here I am also meeting with senior military & diplomatic leaders to discuss the fight against ISIS Iranian aggression tensions at key shipping routes trade with the US & more. It is important that our troops know how many people at home are praying for them every day.

Merry Christmas Eve from the Middle East! It is such an honor to be on my 5th consecutive Christmas week trip to visit our troops overseas serving them holiday meals and delivering Tate’s Cookies made in NY-1. https://t.co/9vl7O72dQ2
Wishing all of my Jewish friends a very #HappyHanukkah! https://t.co/9Fcn8mBZpL

Nearly 100 MS-13 animals in Suffolk County are being brought to justice by our incredible law enforcement at all levels of government. This is great news in the battle against gang violence on Long Island. https://t.co/sQppeCA0c6

The House of Representatives just disgraced itself by voting to impeach a duly elected President of the United States without a crime based on hearsay lies presumptions & an organized misinformation campaign. This is a permanent dark stain on the House of Representatives.
There will be a bipartisan vote on this sham impeachment. It will be a bipartisan vote against.

House Dems are committed to throwing out every rule in the book pushing this sham partisan impeachment w/the weakest impeachment case ever presented. It’s disgusting how many of them ignore 97% of the facts & let their deep hatred for POTUS drive them to tear our country in 1/2.

The House tmrw will advance the most partisan impeachment in US history w/the weakest impeachment case ever. It's a shame that instead of doing the job Americans elected us to do Dems have spent Congress' valuable time trying to obstruct & overturn the results of the ‘16 elex.

Pelosi & others got rolled by the far left on impeachment. They knew better and are doing it anyway and will lose their House majority next November for all of the right reasons. This impeachment charade is almost as incredibly stupid as it is dangerous. https://t.co/bfKMoZXn1k

Judiciary just passed 2 bogus articles of impeachment in a partisan vote. This entire charade will forever be a worst possible black mark. This Congress grossly abused the serious process of impeachment w/ the thinnest case & most rushed 1 sided process to try to take down POTUS.
